original_text: May the Lord, the God of your fathers, make you a thousand times as many as you are and bless you, as he has promised you!
korean_text: 너희 조상의 하나님 여호와께서 너희를 현재보다 천 배나 많게 하시며 너희에게 허락하신 것과 같이 너희에게 복 주시기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: May the Lord, the God of your fathers,
make you a thousand times as many as you are
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 천 배나 더 많게 하시고
